items.title: Master 3D, from zero to hero Vol.7: Create to "Batman"
items.headline: You will learn to create anatomically correct characters with Zbrush, whether normal characters or superheroes
objectives_summary: You will apply the anatomy concepts presented in the first 3 courses of 3D Character Creation; "Vol.4 Fundamentals of Human Anatomy, Vol.5 Head and, Vol.6 Hands" and Feet, of course this is not an impediment to see the course.
At the end of the course, you will understand the steps for the creation of a 3D character applying the process used in a world class production.
You will understand the proportions that you must apply to a character to give him the appearance of a normal character or Superhero.

items.title: Learn to be an Animator. Part 1. "Good habits"
items.headline: Hands-on guide to building solid Animation skills, using exercises with increasing complexity.
objectives_summary: By the end of this Course Students will have good understanding of Animation process, they will work in stages: "Layout", "Blocking", "Rough Animation", "Polish". They will Animate simple Pendulum, 2-section Pendulum and a chain link. After completing this course Students will be strong enough to take my Next course: "Human Locomotion: walk, run, sneak"
